jcr:content.jcr:title: SCALA2 water booster pump
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic will introduce you to the applications and benefits of the water booster pump, SCALA2, including the concept of perfect water pressure.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Grundfos ALPHA3
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic offers an introduction to the ALPHA3 with a special focus on efficient and easy balancing of heating systems in one-family homes.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Grundfos ALPHA2 version D
jcr:content.jcr:description: The latest generation of Grundfos ALPHA2 Version D, retains this domestic circulator as the most advanced and energy efficient circulator on the market. It now also offers a range of service life enhancing functionalities.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Basic Principles and Pump Types
jcr:content.jcr:description: Need to refresh your basic knowledge of how pumps work and are categorised? This topic gives you the answers, and presents the main pump types that Grundfos produces.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Circulator basics and control modes
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic introduces you to the basics of domestic heating, the differences between circulator control modes and when to use each mode.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Grundfos AUTOADAPT
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic will help you to better understand and take advantage of Grundfos AUTOADAPT technology as it is used in some of our products, including the ALPHA2 circulating pump.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Grundfos ALPHA2
jcr:content.jcr:description: The ecademy topic teaches you everything you need to know about the ALPHA2 circulator - from benefits to installation and control modes.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Grundfos UPS2
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic introduces you to the UPS2 circulator range. Find out about the features of the UPS2 and the applications it is suitable for.

jcr:content.jcr:title: The Grundfos SOLOLIFT2
jcr:content.jcr:description: The Grundfos SOLOLIFT2 is a versatile range of macerators for domestic and light commercial buildings. This topic introduces you to the range and looks at its main features and benefits.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Hot water recirculation and the Grundfos Comfort
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic provides an introduction to domestic hot water – or DHW – systems, it presents the Grundfos Comfort range of hot water re-circulation pumps, as well as explaining how Comfort range pumps are installed and commissioned.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Pressure Boosters
jcr:content.jcr:description: Get up to speed on Grundfos CM Booster and MQ boosters, including the advanced CME Booster with a variable speed drive for constant pressure comfort.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Tools for Installers
jcr:content.jcr:description: Grundfos provides installers, building operators and homeowners with a range of tools that save time and money. You can explore some of these under this topic.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Water Wells and other Groundwater Applications
jcr:content.jcr:description: Grundfos supplies a broad range of submersible pumps for water wells and other groundwater applications. Complete this topic for an introduction to our SP/SPA, SQ and SQE water well pumps.

jcr:content.jcr:title: The Grundfos Unilift
jcr:content.jcr:description: Discover how the Grundfos Unilift KP, AP/AP-B and CC meets drainage-related needs in a wide range of applications for domestic housing.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Heating
jcr:content.jcr:description: Learn about the different ways heating circulators are used in domestic homes, while getting up to speed on circulator control modes and the Grundfos circulator range.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Drainage
jcr:content.jcr:description: Drainage pumps are used to empty indoor and outdoor areas of water and other liquids. This topic explains how they work and introduces the Grundfos range of drainage pumps.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Boosting
jcr:content.jcr:description: Find out how booster pumps are used in homes and other small buildings and learn more about the Grundfos boosters.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Grundfos Product Center - Working with projects
Grundfos Product Center - Finding spare parts and service kits
Wastewater  in commercial buildings
jcr:content.jcr:description: Learn all about the most common approaches to wastewater removal in commercial buildings as well as drainage considerations in planning a building.

jcr:content.jcr:title: High efficiency hydronic systems
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic teaches you about the advantages of hydronic systems of forced air systems as well as the basic principles of radiant cooling and heating.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Heating Systems
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic teaches you about heating systems in commercial buildings with a special focus on balancing and the advantages of using intelligent pump solutions.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Grundfos SQ/SQE
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic offers a general introduction to submersible pumps for domestic applications with a special focus on the SQ/SQE pump.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Buildings Information Modeling
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic introduces Buildings Information Modeling (BIM) to explain what it is and what it does. It also considers some of the challenges of BIM, and how Grundfos’ data-light approach addresses these challenges to provide more efficient solutions.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Commercial Heating Systems
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic teaches you about heating systems in commercial buildings with a special focus on balancing and the advantages of using intelligent pump solutions.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Water boosting in commercial buildings
jcr:content.jcr:description: In this topic you will learn about pressure boosting and how you can increase comfort and bring down operational costs by choosing the optimum solution.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Life Cycle Costs
jcr:content.jcr:description: This ecademy topic introduces you to the concept of life cycle cost analysis and reveals the hidden costs of a pumping system.

jcr:content.jcr:title: About MAGNA3
jcr:content.jcr:description: Complete this topic to learn everything you need to know about the Grundfos MAGNA3 circulating pump, including technical details and installer and homeowner benefits.

jcr:content.jcr:title: MAGNA3 Operation and Control
jcr:content.jcr:description: Complete this topic to learn everything you need to know about the Grundfos MAGNA3 circulating pump, including technical details and installer and homeowner benefits.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Selling MAGNA3
jcr:content.jcr:description: Complete this topic to learn everything you need to know about the Grundfos MAGNA3 circulating pump, including technical details and installer and homeowner benefits.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Grundfos MAGNA1
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic teaches you about heating systems in commercial buildings with a special focus on balancing and the advantages of using intelligent pump solutions.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Shower Booster Pumps
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic will give you an overview of different shower system types, basic requirements and Grundfos Shower Pump solutions.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Introduction to temperature control
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic will give a quick introduction to temperature control systems, including how to optimise and what to be aware of when designing a system.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Industrial Water Treatment
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic offers a general introduction to water treatment in industrial processes, including a more detailed survey of the different process steps.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Boiler systems
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic offers insights on what to be aware of when designing steam boiler systems and how to ensure efficient level control in the boiler.

jcr:content.jcr:title: The basics of desalination
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic will provide you with an understanding of how desalination systems work, why commissioning pays off and how to turn brine into pure energy.

jcr:content.jcr:title: System optimisation in industrial applications
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic explains how challenging traditional system design and applying an intelligent approach will result in simpler, more energy-efficient or more compact systems.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Grundfos District Energy
jcr:content.jcr:description: Learn the principles behind one of the most sustainable energy systems and get a sneak peak into the future of district energy.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Prefabricated Pumping Stations
jcr:content.jcr:description: The topic will provide you with a general understanding of prefabricated pumping stations in wastewater transport, how monitoring products can optimise the stations as well as how to plan more cost-efficient refurbishment projects.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Industrial Water Supply Systems
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic will give you an understanding of how industrial water supply systems work, why selecting the right pump is crucial and the importance of monitoring.

jcr:content.jcr:title: ALPHA1 L Circulator Pump
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic will introduce you to the ALPHA1 L circulator pump and its main benefits, while giving you a clear idea of the applications in which it can be used.

jcr:content.jcr:title: An extended look at Building Information Modeling (BIM)
Applying proportional pressure in water boosting systems
Introduction to Buildings Information Modelling
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic introduces Buildings Information Modeling (BIM) to explain what it is and what it does. It also considers some of the challenges of BIM, and how Grundfos’ data-light approach addresses these challenges to provide more efficient solutions.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Wastewater transport
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic will take you underground with a focus on wastewater pits and how to ensure optimum performance by means of correct dimensioning and design.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Groundwater Pumping
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic will provide you with all you need to know about groundwater intake, including pump sizing, efficiency optimisation, performance regulation and life-extending precautions.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Easy balancing using the GO Balance app with the ALPHA2 circulator
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic offers an introduction to the ALPHA2 with a special focus on efficient and easy balancing of heating systems in one-family homes.

jcr:content.jcr:title: The ALPHA2 circulator pump and easy balancing with the GO Balance app
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic offers an introduction to the ALPHA2 with a special focus on efficient and easy balancing of heating systems in one-family homes.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Full control and balancing with the ALPHA3 connected circulator pump
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic will give you a thorough insight into the ALPHA3, the first circulator with a built-in Bluetooth connection, focusing on the benefits when using Grundfos GO apps for control and balancing.

jcr:content.jcr:title: The MAGNA1 Model C circulator pump
jcr:content.jcr:description: Covering everything from the main benefits of the pump, to a comprehensive installation guide, this topic will give you a thorough understanding of the MAGNA1 Model C circulator pump and how to get the most from it.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Mixing in Wastewater Treatment
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic will provide you with an understanding of new perspectives within wastewater treatment as well as insight into the importance of positioning mixers correctly in the tank.

jcr:content.jcr:title: The Grundfos CMBE Twin booster system
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic will provide you with a thorough introduction to the Grundfos CMBE booster system, giving you a comprehensive walkthrough of the many advantages that it brings.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Grundfos ALPHA1 circulator pump functionality
jcr:content.jcr:description: This topic provides an introduction to the ALPHA1 circulator pump features, and how these benefit installers and homeowners.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Solar pumping systems
jcr:content.jcr:description: Find out about the basics of solar water pumping systems and the applications in which they can be used. You will also gain a thorough understanding of the advantages of selected solar-powered Grundfos pumps and become familiar with sizing and selecting a solar pump in Grundfos Product Center.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Solar pumping system accessories
jcr:content.jcr:description: Find out about the different types of solar panels and how to use and size your own panels in Grundfos Product Center. Get a complete overview as we guide you through the many accessories for solar water pumping solutions.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Community water supply systems
jcr:content.jcr:description: Learn about the advantages of solar-powered, automated ultrafiltration water treatment systems and find out how water kiosks can build a reliable water supply scheme in off-grid communities. We will also take a closer look at the Grundfos AQpure water treatment system as well as the Grundfos AQtap water ATM.

jcr:content.jcr:title: Water Distribution
jcr:content.jcr:description: This course will give you a thorough introduction to Grundfos Water Distribution and the many benefits of system pressure management.
